about_the_game:
SeaBed Audio Novel Collection is a series of newly written audio novels for the beloved yuri-themed mystery visual novel.

Episode 2 - "Cafe and the Stone Port". - Length: 15:29.

A Peaceful café. Photo album. A place for ourselves.

Upon leaving the school, Sachiko and Takako walk down the street making small talk.
As they reach the broad avenue far off downtown, they find the road lively with traffic for the early afternoon.
Takako raises her voice for Sachiko to hear her over the loud sound of a large passing truck, and of the wind blowing in the sand.
The two girls enter an alley leading to the shopping district in an old part of the town.
There, you can find shops and stores with age-old signs, and they always attract the two girls on their way home.

The episodes are delivered in both a subtitled video format, and a Japanese audio-only track in .wav format.

The video supports Japanese, Japanese (closed captions), English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Korean subtitles which can be switched at will.

Staff

  • Produced by Fruitbat Factory
  • Original Concept by Paleontology
  • Scenario by hide38
  • Directed by AKIRA
  • Illustration by Tonbu

Starring

  • Mizuno Sachiko (Narrator & High Schooler): Kondo Yui
  • Takako: Matsui Eriko
  • Weather Report, Coffee Shop Owner: Tokiwa Shouhei

Disclaimer: Video subtitles may not display correctly on some video players. In such a case, please try changing the subtitle settings or using another video player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Stereo headphones recommended for optimal viewing experience.
